Total Cost of Revenue: cost of goods and services sold
cost of services oil and gas
gas gathering transportation marketing and processing costs related party
oil and gas property lease operating expense related party

Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest

Other Income (Expense): derivative instruments gain loss recognized in income net
derivative instruments not designated as hedging instruments gain loss net
equity method investment realized gain loss on disposal
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
income loss from equity method investments

General and Administrative: related party transaction selling general and administrative expenses from transactions with related party
Other Operating Expenses: impairment of oil and gas properties

Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income defined benefit plans adjustment net of tax portion attributable to parent

Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

Total Revenues: revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax
revenue from related parties liquid natural gas sales revenue
revenue from related parties natural gas sales

__unmapped__: basic earnings per share pro forma
common stock dividends per share declared
income tax expense benefit pro forma
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
